head.supplied: Melbourne bot Garden, ¶ 26/4/73 ¶ ¶ At last, dear Mr Ramsay, the plants for you have been shipped by the Steamer, leaving to day. As you know how ruinously my Department has been curtailed in means, ...

div.p: Alec H. Chisholm papers, MLMSS 3540/Box H4996, Mitchell Library, State Library of NSW, Sydney.

At last, dear Mr Ramsay, the plants for you have been shipped by the Steamer, leaving to day. As you know how ruinously my Department has been curtailed in means, it will not be necessary to excuse the unavoidable delay, thus also arising in this instance.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
